Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to get all supported logistic channels.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Shipping options of Direct Shop will follow Local Shop.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: common.invalid_shop
error_list.description: Shop id is invalid. Please check your shop.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

If the value is 0 or null, that means there is no limit for the item weight.","key":"wQeBDBe"}],"key":"GzRsTRx"},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"logistics_description","description":"For checkout channels, this field indicates its corresponding fulfillment channels.","key":"GtXScdN"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"force_enable","description":"Indicates whether the logistic channel is force enabled on Shop Level. If it’s 0, it indicates the channel is a checkout(masked) channel; if it’s not 0, indicate the channel is a fulfillment channel and has a checkout channel(checkout channel’s channel_id equals this mask_channel_id) on top of it. Multiple channels may share the same mask_channel_id.","key":"BKppjnn"},{"description":"

Indicate whether the channel is blocked to use seller cover shipping fee function.

if the channel does not allow sellers to cover shipping fee, then the block_seller_cover_shipping_fee field will return true, otherwise it will return false.

","name":"block_seller_cover_shipping_fee","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"QmPJFrK"},{"description":"

","name":"seller_logistic_has_configuration","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"eCQcEpB"},{"description":"

","name":"logistics_capability","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"XpSGGAs","children":[{"description":"

","name":"seller_logistics","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"EQwahfy"}]},{"description":"
